content: **knitted head band in drops nepal piece knitted back and forth with cables size s - xl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #toffeetwistheadband drops design pattern ne-402 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm head band measure approx 12 cm vertically **yarn** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 8917 walnut **needles** drops single pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops cable needle **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 24 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
